title: Verizon, Intel and Dow stocks are the biggest 'dogs' of the Dow as 2022 ends
text:
Meanwhile, shares of Verizon have lost 24.7% in 2022, Intel has dropped 49.2% and Dow has declined 11.3% while the Dow industrials have fallen 9.3%. Of the Dow components that don't pay dividends, shares of Boeing Co. BA have slipped 6.1% this year, Walt Disney Co. DIS has slid 44.7% and Salesforce Inc. CRM has given up 48.4%.

Verizon, Intel and Dow stocks are the biggest 'dogs' of the Dow as 2022 ends
